name: Glatfelter Corporation
description: Glatfelter Corporation is a global supplier of engineered materials, providing innovative solutions in the specialty paper and fiber-based products markets. Founded in 1864 and headquartered in York, Pennsylvania, Glatfelter operates manufacturing facilities in North America, Europe, and Asia. The company specializes in the production of nonwoven materials, specialty papers, and composite materials for a variety of applications including hygiene, filtration, food packaging, and industrial markets. With a commitment to sustainability, Glatfelter employs environmentally responsible manufacturing practices and sources raw materials from sustainable forests. The company focuses on innovation and customer collaboration to deliver high-quality products that meet the evolving needs of its customers. Glatfelter's mission is to be a trusted partner, delivering superior products and services while fostering a culture of sustainability and operational excellence. In addition to its strong market presence, Glatfelter is dedicated to research and development, continuously investing in new technologies and processes to enhance product performance and reduce environmental impact.
